comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: Thode Fagelund  operated by Wilhelmsen. Built by J.Priestley of Sunderland in1904, 4350 gross tons.  Torpedoed by German U-boat UA27 on 12th March 1917 off Holland.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Read All About It! - The wreck - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14954178 The salvage - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14947787 I think Potter Point is this reef - GoogleMapsSatellite
